sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_7ad1c3d493a67210aa09bfea2bba10eb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Receive Issue</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    try {
        var requestBody = request.body.data;

        if (!requestBody.issue) {
            response.setStatus(400);
            return {
                error: "Invalid Payload",
                message: "No issue data found in the request."
            };
        }

        var gitHubID = requestBody.issue.id.toString();
        var title = requestBody.issue.title;
        var body = requestBody.issue.body;
        var action = requestBody.action;

        gs.info("GitHub Integration: Received {0} action for Issue ID {1}", action, gitHubID);

        if (action === "opened") {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
            gr.initialize();
            gr.short_description = "GitHub Issue: " + title;
            gr.description = "Source GitHub ID: " + gitHubID + "\n\n" + body;
            gr.contact_type = "api";
            gr.x_1642813_github_0_github_issue_number = requestBody.issue.number.toString();

            var incidentSysID = gr.insert();

            response.setStatus(201);
            return {
                result: "Success",
                incident_number: gr.getValue('number'),
                incident_sys_id: incidentSysID
            };
        } else {
            return {
                result: "Ignored",
                message: "Action was not 'opened'"
            };
        }

    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("GitHub Integration Error: " + ex.message);
        response.setStatus(500);
        return {
            error: "Server Error",
            detail: ex.message
        };
    }

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1642813_github_0/github_webhook</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-16 08:28:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ad1c3d493a67210aa09bfea2bba10eb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Receive Issue</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GitHub Operations Hub" source="x_1642813_github_0">2f2a7e5493667210aa09bfea2bba102c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Operations Hub">2f2a7e5493667210aa09bfea2bba102c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7ad1c3d493a67210aa09bfea2bba10eb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-16 10:02:09</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GitHub Webhook Handler">c74b321893667210aa09bfea2bba106d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
